‚ö†Ô∏è **This type is _unstable_ and may change significantly in a way that the data won't be backwards compatible.**
Specifies the coordinate frame for an entity.

**Experimental:** Transform frames are still in early development!

If not specified, the coordinate frame uses an implicit frame derived from the entity path.
